page.shortlink: ux viewbox builder viewbox properties orientation autoselect
page.description: Allows you to specify what ViewBox layout to use when the device's orientation changes.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Auto-select on orientation change]* let's you configure a ViewBox to display using a different layout when the device's orientation changes. The ViewBox can be configured to show different layouts for portrait and landscape orientation. When checked, the [Portrait layout] and [Landscape layout] properties are exposed.
This property is only shown when [Has multiple layouts] is enabled.
